<article style=""><h1>Artificial Intelligence</h1><p>It's the stuff of sci-fi movies and dystopian, end-of-humanity nightmares - and now, of mind-numbingly dull white-collar work. After decades of premature promises, artificial intelligence is finding its way into all sorts of businesses. Its arrival has been low-key.</p><img src="https://assets.bwbx.io/images/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/i6w2sv_y9ehQ/v1/1200x-1.jpg" /></article>
